title: Facebook and Google Have Happy Workers. It Might Be Helping Their Stocks.
text:
Do happy workers make for better stock returns? There’s evidence for it, and some of the biggest beneficiaries may be tech giants like Alphabet, Facebook, and Netflix.

According to a note published Thursday by quantitative analysts at Bank of America Merrill Lynch, there appears to be a correlation between employee satisfaction and stock returns. The sector scoring best is communication services, according to BofAML. It is home to some tech giants, including Alphabet (ticker: GOOGL), Facebook (FB), and Netflix (NFLX), media...
description: Do happy workers make for better stock returns? There’s evidence for it, and some of the biggest beneficiaries may be tech giants like Alphabet, Facebook, and Netflix.
